venue.name: William J Connel Memorial Rink and Pool

item.description:
Please join us for adult lap swimming. Tuesday night, no swim team!

Showers and changing area available in locker room. No lockers available, but bags are allowed in the pool area on the shelves or benches. Lifeguards on site.
*remember pool shoes or flip flops and a bag for your wet suit, and maybe an extra towel to dry off with when you change.

If you are looking for an inexpensive suit or pool gear (cap, goggles, kick board, etc), check out one of my favorite websites. www.swimoutlet.com GREAT prices and brands.

Connell Memorial Swimming Pool (Mass Dept of Conservation and Recreation- DCR, formerly MDC)
220 Broad Street
Weymouth, MA 02188
781 335 2090

Admission is FREE at all DCR managed pools.

Tuesday at 7pm.
Pool is open until 9pm

We will meet in the pool area.

..

group.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: Adult Lap Swim
